title: PEOPLE DONT KNOW WAT A SUPPORT DOES SO MANY NOOBS
body:
SO I WAS PLAYING SUPPORT AND THIS ADC (DRAVEN I THINK) GETS MAD AND SAYS OMG NOOB U 0/9 FEEDER GO UNINSTALL. I HAD 11 ASSISTS AT 21 MINUTES SO I HAD A POSITIVE SCORE BUT HE IS DUMB SO HE SAY NOOB 0/9. 

GOD THIS COMMUNITY IS STUPID. A SUPPORT DOESNT KS U AND U MAKE FUN OF THEIR POSITIVE SCORE.

replies.body: Some people don't know what a Caps Lock does, either.
APPARENTLY IM ONE OF THOSE PEOPLE

> [{quoted}](name=Poke12345,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zOuAFuHR,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:03:24.507+0000)
>
> SO I WAS PLAYING SUPPORT AND THIS ADC (DRAVEN I THINK) GETS MAD AND SAYS OMG NOOB U 0/9 FEEDER GO UNINSTALL. I HAD 11 ASSISTS AT 21 MINUTES SO I HAD A POSITIVE SCORE BUT HE IS DUMB SO HE SAY NOOB 0/9. 
> 
> GOD THIS COMMUNITY IS STUPID. A SUPPORT DOESNT KS U AND U MAKE FUN OF THEIR POSITIVE SCORE.

Dude, chill with the caps. I understand you are frustrated, but don't take it out on the forums. I can't see 0/9/11 in your match history, so I assume you are playing on a different account, or you are bored and complaining about something a couple of games back.

0/9/11 in 21 minutes? Um... I think he is upset at you because you weren't actually supporting him. "Suppport." The role name speaks for itself. You "support", or help, the ADC. When I see scores like 0/9/11 or something similar (like 0/7/8, 0/9/12, 1/12/15), I tend to assume you were not actually supporting. Now of course there is a possibility your ADC kept getting caught out, but 9 deaths in 21 minutes? You had to die 9 times to pick up 11 assists? As a support, you are supposed to help the ADC, not run headlong, die, and then pick up an assist. Also 0/9/11 is not a positive support score. It is a KDA over 1, but IMO, KDA = K - D + .5A. 

So 0 - 9 + .5 x 11
-9 + 5.5
um.... -3.5 score.

> [{quoted}](name=Dumb Monster,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zOuAFuHR,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:10:44.154+0000)
>
> Dude, chill with the caps. I understand you are frustrated, but don't take it out on the forums. I can't see 0/9/11 in your match history, so I assume you are playing on a different account, or you are bored and complaining about something a couple of games back.
> 
> 0/9/11 in 21 minutes? Um... I think he is upset at you because you weren't actually supporting him. "Suppport." The role name speaks for itself. You "support", or help, the ADC. When I see scores like 0/9/11 or something similar (like 0/7/8, 0/9/12, 1/12/15), I tend to assume you were not actually supporting. Now of course there is a possibility your ADC kept getting caught out, but 9 deaths in 21 minutes? You had to die 9 times to pick up 11 assists? As a support, you are supposed to help the ADC, not run headlong, die, and then pick up an assist. Also 0/9/11 is not a positive support score. It is a KDA over 1, but IMO, KDA = K - D + .5A. 
> 
> So 0 - 9 + .5 x 11
> -9 + 5.5
> um.... -3.5 score.

So 0/8/15 is negative? That's dumb.

> [{quoted}](name=Poke12345,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zOuAFuHR,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:22:30.684+0000)
>
> So 0/8/15 is negative? That's dumb.

As a support, gameplay is what really matters, not score. In general, you never want to measure by KDA scoring or anything like that. It's what's **behind**the numbers that matter. However, you did not provide many details on how the game actually went. You just told us about your raging adc and your 0/9/11 score. 

0/8/15

8 deaths: How did you get 8 deaths? Did you save your teammates 7 times? How long did the game last? Did you die too many times in lane?
15 assists: Did you just heal your 95% health teammate as he was getting a kill? Or were you {{champion:25}} snaring an enemy to secure a kill for the team? 

Now again, 0/9/11 in 21 minutes? 9 deaths in 21 minutes with only 11 assists. That makes me think you just ran headlong, die, and then pick up 1 or 2 assists after.
9 deaths is unacceptable, especially if you only had 11 assists. As support, a score that looks more like 0-4-15 is what you should be looking for, not just "not negative".

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zOuAFuHR,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:17:44.934+0000)
>
> 9 deaths is unacceptable, especially if you only had 11 assists. As support, a score that looks more like 0-4-15 is what you should be looking for, not just "not negative".

I wouldn't even consider 0/9/11 positive.

IMO KDA =  K - D + .5 A

0 - 9 + .5 x 11

Score: -3.5

Plus, if someone is 0/9/11 in 21 minutes, it usually means he is just running headlong, dying, and then picking up an assist afterward.

yeah, that's what I do too, but *technically* speaking, under the official system used in the LCS he had a KDA score of 11/9, or 1.22.

Even in a losing game as a support you should aim for at *least* a 2.0 KDA. For instance, my last support match as Alistar I went 4/7/26 for an official KDA of 4.29, or under yours and my own stricter system, 2.43, and I ended up losing that match because our solo laners and jungler fed (and a 20 kill Vayne can only do so much when her only sensible ally is a support Alistar and the enemy has 3 fed assassins).

EDIT: KDA score is calculated by dividing (K+A)/D not just adding and subtracting the flat values, because a 1.0 KDA means you broke even, where a 0.5 KDA means you fed twice as many kills as you participated in. Even under our stricter version of KDA, he still had a score of 0.61, since you can't have a KDA below 0 no matter how hard you feed.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zOuAFuHR,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:27:59.066+0000)
>
> yeah, that's what I do too, but *technically* speaking, under the official system used in the LCS he had a KDA score of 11/9, or 1.22.
> 
> Even in a losing game as a support you should aim for at *least* a 2.0 KDA. For instance, my last support match as Alistar I went 4/7/26 for an official KDA of 4.29, or under yours and my own stricter system, 2.43, and I ended up losing that match because our solo laners and jungler fed (and a 20 kill Vayne can only do so much when her only sensible ally is a support Alistar and the enemy has 3 fed assassins).
> 
> EDIT: KDA score is calculated by dividing (K+A)/D not just adding and subtracting the flat values, because a 1.0 KDA means you broke even, where a 0.5 KDA means you fed twice as many kills as you participated in. Even under our stricter version of KDA, he still had a score of 0.61, since you can't have a KDA below 0 no matter how hard you feed.

Yes, I know what the actual way to calculate it is. But it's not the best way. There is no difference between being 15/8/0 and 0/8/15. A KDA of 4 could be you going 0/1/4 because you were J4 tossing a couple of flags near teammates, then going AFK at 0/1/4. Or it could be you carrying the match going 33/9/3.

> [{quoted}](name=Poke12345,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zOuAFuHR,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:03:24.507+0000)
>
> SO I WAS PLAYING SUPPORT AND THIS ADC (DRAVEN I THINK) GETS MAD AND SAYS OMG NOOB U 0/9 FEEDER GO UNINSTALL. I HAD 11 ASSISTS AT 21 MINUTES SO I HAD A POSITIVE SCORE BUT HE IS DUMB SO HE SAY NOOB 0/9. 
> 
> GOD THIS COMMUNITY IS STUPID. A SUPPORT DOESNT KS U AND U MAKE FUN OF THEIR POSITIVE SCORE.

http://wardscore.loltools.net/?name=Poke12345%20&region=na Your warding is mediocre... perhaps you should shore up the quality of your game before you start flaming the community over one player...

> [{quoted}](name=TeemoJenkins,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zOuAFuHR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:10:50.397+0000)
>
> http://wardscore.loltools.net/?name=Poke12345%20&region=na Your warding is mediocre... perhaps you should shore up the quality of your game before you start flaming the community over one player...

I doubt this is on this account since I do not see 0/9/11 on his LoLking.  All I see are Zed, Yi, Teemo, and Yasuo games, and I doubt he was supporting with those champs judging by the scores and builds. Interesting site though, never seen this before.

EDIT: Thanks for the site. I ward more than 78% of tanks and 61% of recorded players. :D

> [{quoted}](name=Dumb Monster,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zOuAFuHR,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:11:34.519+0000)
>
> I doubt this is on this account since I do not see 0/9/11 on his LoLking. Interesting site though, never seen this before.

it's my barometer to know how well I'm keeping up.  Vision has been something I've been working on in the past year as I was always high on wards as support, but my other positions were lacking.
Well it also kinda depends on who you are playing support with........

> [{quoted}](name=SurferDude24,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=zOuAFuHR,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-24T00:08:16.899+0000)
>
> Well it also kinda depends on who you are playing support with........

Very true. If you were someone with a heal or shield, you could just be running headlong with Sona or Soraka, dying, and then picking up an assist after your teammates got a kill.

And on top of it all, it's Draven.

Like, does he not enjoy making use of his passive or something?

Yeah honestly a lot of players don't know what the support role means. If this is all about ranked games I support this topic 100%, but if not.. then I suggest start playing ranked as you won't have as many noobs.
